issue.title: [C++] BM_ArrowBinaryDict/EncodeLowLevel is not deterministic
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11490](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11490). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This benchmark is pretty unreliable if you run more than one iteration.  Even though it is setting a constant seed each time it is not clearing the old values from the previous runs and so it ends up running on different data each iteration which can have drastically different results.
